about_the_game:
Enhance your experience within the Exhale XR app with this VR immersion from the Exhale wellness library.

Experience Details
This unique mixture of experiences combine fresh and saltwater creatures. You begin submerged in a freshwater lake with adorable fish swimming all around you. Enjoy the beautiful green and blue gradient as the waters soothe your stress. As you begin into the next experience, gaze upon the magnificent skyline along the sandy beach. Looking down you see a busy little crab. Watch as he goes about his daily task in this serene environment. Following that you will get to experience a very busy turtle pond. Sit on the rock beside the pond and watch as the turtles float around without a care in the world. For the final moment in this immersion you go down into the ocean with a blue crab who is curiously close.

Purpose
Relaxation
Adventure
Totem meditation
Aquaphobia aid

Length
10:16

Specs
360° video
3840x2160
29.97fps
.mp4 file type

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel i5 2nd gen equivalent or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidea GTX 1060 equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 3rd gen equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVideo GTX 2070 or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
